channel.title: | Rune-Impact |
channel.description:
[center][center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5WOHJ.png[/img]
Welcome the official Rune-Impact development thread.
Considering someone else took the name RuneXero I decided to create a new server with a new name, meaning a [b]completely[/b] new start. I realized that only a handle full of people like the old-school PI servers so I saw no point in continuing development on my old base as I would just be wasting my time. I never really liked 600+ graphics, animation, gfx whatever but I thought I would be able to do a good job on making it realistic (nothing half-assed). That's where Rune-Impact comes in; I plan on keeping it around 2009-2010'ish with the exceptions of the graphics. [/center]
[u][b]Skill base.[/b][/u]
[b]- Melee:[/b] Flawless timers, animations, and hits. Max Hit formula is almost exact to RuneScape! Nothing overpowered and nothing underpowered! [b]- Ranged:[/b] Amazing timers, hits, and animations also, uses new RuneScape bonus's and features! [b]- Magic:[/b] All spells work 100% modern and ancient! Perfect timing and animation with amazing hits. Hybriding is flawless.
[b]- Prayer:[/b] ‣ All bones on altar work. ‣ All bones can be buried. ‣ Correct animations.
[b]- Mining:[/b] ‣ All ores can be mined. ‣ Ore running out / re-filling. ‣ Prospecting. ‣ Correct animations.
[b]- Smithing:[/b] ‣ All ores can be smelt. ‣ All armor in smithing interface is smithable. ‣ Correct animations and objects used.
[b]- Fishing:[/b] ‣ Correct items requirements. ‣ Correct animations. ‣ All fish can be caught. ‣ Animation resting support.
[b]- Cooking:[/b] ‣ Correct animations. ‣ All fish can be cooked. ‣ Correct burning formula. ‣ Cooking on ranges / log-fires etc.
[b]- Woodcutting:[/b] ‣ Correct hatchet animations. ‣ Correct hatchet finding. ‣ All trees cut-able. ‣ Stumps and re-growing trees. ‣ Birds nests falling.
[b]- Firemaking:[/b] ‣ All logs light-able. ‣ Adding and depleting of lightened logs. ‣ Correct animations. ‣ Ashes appear after log burns out. ‣ Clipping.
[b]- Agility:[/b] ‣ Gnome course, with correct animations. ‣ Barbarian course, with correct animations. ‣ Un-cheatable and flawless.
[b]- Herblore:[/b] ‣ Create near-all potions. ‣ Cleaning herbs support. ‣ Herb identifying with level support. ‣ Correct animations. ‣ Correct potion making.
[b]- Thieving:[/b] ‣ Ability to thieve all NPC's. ‣ Chances to be caught and stunned. ‣ Thieving from stalls with correct rewards. ‣ Stall items disappear after theft. ‣ Correct animations.
[b]- Crafting:[/b] ‣ Correct animations. ‣ Working interfaces. ‣ Cutting gems. ‣ Making leather chaps / bodies etc. ‣ Tanning & Interface.
[b]- Rune-Crafting:[/b] ‣ Working multiple crafting. ‣ All altars working. ‣ Use of the abyss. ‣ Pouches; Small, Regular, Large. ‣ Correct animations.
[b]- Fletching:[/b] ‣ All logs can be fletched. ‣ Creating bows. ‣ Creating shafts. ‣ Stringing bows. ‣ Correct animations.
[b]- Slayer:[/b] ‣ Low, Medium and Hard tasks. ‣ Various slayer masters in their correct locations. ‣ Slayer task depends on your combat level. ‣ Correct dialogue for different slayer masters.
[b]- Farming:[/b] ‣ Can use basic seeds on patch. ‣ Need to rake, dib and water.
[u][b]Misc.[/b][/u]
[b] - Duel arena:[/b] ‣ All dupes fixed. ‣ Fully functional. ‣ 508 map data, meaning I'll be working on tournaments.
[b] - Fight caves:[/b] ‣ 63 waves. ‣ Safe spots. ‣ No need to re-log for wave to start. ‣ Jad releases healers when it's at half HP. ‣ Correct animations, projectiles and graphics used.
[b]- Fight pits:[/b] ‣ Correct timer. ‣ After entering, free-for-all. ‣ Last fighter in gets tokkul as reward.
[b]- Barrows:[/b] ‣ All brothers working with effects and so on. ‣ Projectiles and graphics used are correct. ‣ Must have 6 kills before entering the tomb and looting the chest. ‣ Perfect rewards.
[b]- Mage arena:[/b] ‣ Kolodian located in Mage Bank. ‣ Correct graphics, animations, requirements and projectiles used. ‣ Can obtain both staff and cape from Statue room.
[b][u]Images.[/u][/b]
Added quick-prayers. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wNKrh.png[/img]
Cleaned the quest tab and added necessary information. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/y6DsX.png[/img]
Added a starter interface when you login. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rT1Qi.png[/img]
Clipped too:). [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uW6Jw.png[/img]
Birds nest fall too. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Yf8sI.gif[/img] [/center]

item.title: | Rune-Impact |
item.dc:creator: @Xx_Weed_Xx Xx Weed Xx
item.description:
@Xx_Weed_Xx wrote:

[center][center]

Welcome the official Rune-Impact development thread.

Considering someone else took the name RuneXero I decided to create a new server with a new name, meaning a completely new start. I realized that only a handle full of people like the old-school PI servers so I saw no point in continuing development on my old base as I would just be wasting my time. I never really liked 600+ graphics, animation, gfx whatever but I thought I would be able to do a good job on making it realistic (nothing half-assed). That’s where Rune-Impact comes in; I plan on keeping it around 2009-2010’ish with the exceptions of the graphics. [/center]

Skill base.

- Melee: Flawless timers, animations, and hits. Max Hit formula is almost exact to RuneScape! Nothing overpowered and nothing underpowered!
- Ranged: Amazing timers, hits, and animations also, uses new RuneScape bonus’s and features!
- Magic: All spells work 100% modern and ancient! Perfect timing and animation with amazing hits. Hybriding is flawless.

- Prayer:
‣ All bones on altar work.
‣ All bones can be buried.
‣ Correct animations.

- Mining:
‣ All ores can be mined.
‣ Ore running out / re-filling.
‣ Prospecting.
‣ Correct animations.

- Smithing:
‣ All ores can be smelt.
‣ All armor in smithing interface is smithable.
‣ Correct animations and objects used.

- Fishing:
‣ Correct items requirements.
‣ Correct animations.
‣ All fish can be caught.
‣ Animation resting support.

- Cooking:
‣ Correct animations.
‣ All fish can be cooked.
‣ Correct burning formula.
‣ Cooking on ranges / log-fires etc.

- Woodcutting:
‣ Correct hatchet animations.
‣ Correct hatchet finding.
‣ All trees cut-able.
‣ Stumps and re-growing trees.
‣ Birds nests falling.

- Firemaking:
‣ All logs light-able.
‣ Adding and depleting of lightened logs.
‣ Correct animations.
‣ Ashes appear after log burns out.
‣ Clipping.

- Agility:
‣ Gnome course, with correct animations.
‣ Barbarian course, with correct animations.
‣ Un-cheatable and flawless.

- Herblore:
‣ Create near-all potions.
‣ Cleaning herbs support.
‣ Herb identifying with level support.
‣ Correct animations.
‣ Correct potion making.

- Thieving:
‣ Ability to thieve all NPC’s.
‣ Chances to be caught and stunned.
‣ Thieving from stalls with correct rewards.
‣ Stall items disappear after theft.
‣ Correct animations.

- Crafting:
‣ Correct animations.
‣ Working interfaces.
‣ Cutting gems.
‣ Making leather chaps / bodies etc.
‣ Tanning & Interface.

- Rune-Crafting:
‣ Working multiple crafting.
‣ All altars working.
‣ Use of the abyss.
‣ Pouches; Small, Regular, Large.
‣ Correct animations.

- Fletching:
‣ All logs can be fletched.
‣ Creating bows.
‣ Creating shafts.
‣ Stringing bows.
‣ Correct animations.

- Slayer:
‣ Low, Medium and Hard tasks.
‣ Various slayer masters in their correct locations.
‣ Slayer task depends on your combat level.
‣ Correct dialogue for different slayer masters.

- Farming:
‣ Can use basic seeds on patch.
‣ Need to rake, dib and water.

Misc.

- Duel arena:
‣ All dupes fixed.
‣ Fully functional.
‣ 508 map data, meaning I’ll be working on tournaments.

- Fight caves:
‣ 63 waves.
‣ Safe spots.
‣ No need to re-log for wave to start.
‣ Jad releases healers when it’s at half HP.
‣ Correct animations, projectiles and graphics used.

- Fight pits:
‣ Correct timer.
‣ After entering, free-for-all.
‣ Last fighter in gets tokkul as reward.

- Barrows:
‣ All brothers working with effects and so on.
‣ Projectiles and graphics used are correct.
‣ Must have 6 kills before entering the tomb and looting the chest.
‣ Perfect rewards.

- Mage arena:
‣ Kolodian located in Mage Bank.
‣ Correct graphics, animations, requirements and projectiles used.
‣ Can obtain both staff and cape from Statue room.

Images.

Added quick-prayers.

Cleaned the quest tab and added necessary information.

Added a starter interface when you login.

Clipped too:).

Birds nest fall too.

[/center]

Read full topic
